en.title: [4Q 2024] Business Tendency
en.description: Quarterly business expectations for their performance 1 to 2 quarters ahead, including for revenue, employment, and demand.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly business expectations, covering firms' projections for their revenue, employment, and demand over the next 1 to 2 quarters.

bm.title: [ST4 2024] Kecenderungan Perniagaan
bm.description: Jangkaan suku tahunan perniagaan bagi prestasi mereka 1 ke 2 suku tahun ke hadapan, termasuk hasil, pekerja, dan permintaan.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan jangkaan perniagaan suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi anggaran perniagaan untuk hasil, guna tenaga, dan permintaan pada 1 ke 2 suku tahun akan datang.
